name: Rail Maze Pro
description:
Rail Maze Pro adds even more fun and challenge to Rail Maze game.

Additional Levels, new game mode, no ads, and more in the Pro version of Rail Maze.

Rail Maze Pro is the latest game by Spooky House Studios - creators of big hits: Bubble Explode and Bubble Shootix.

Solve 100+ of challenging and unique puzzles, build railroads, bomb through obstacles, escape PIRATES on rails. Have a lot of fun with this new and unique puzzle game.

Features:
* 100+ puzzles
* Tunnels
* Bombs
* PIRATE trains
* Super long trains
* Global online scoreboards by Scoreloop
* 5 game modes:
LABYRINTH - Puzzle,
LABYRINTH PRO - Puzzle,
BUILD RAILROAD - Action,
SNAKE - Action (Available as an In-App-Purchase)
LONGEST RAILROAD - Puzzle Action (Available as an In-App-Purchase)

Additional Items available in the game as an InAppPurchase:
- Solutions for Labyrinth game modes;
- Snake game mode;
- Longest RailRoad game mode;


Get Rail Maze Pro now!
